text: (Ej musalmonon,) az zaʙhe, ki nomi Alloh ʙar on jod nasudaast, naxured, ʙa monandi xudmurda va on ci ʙaroi ʙut jo cin zaʙh sudast. Hamono xurdani in guna zaʙhsudaho fisq (gunoh) ast. Va sajotini cin ʙa dustoni xud az sajtonhoi insi vahj mekunand, ki ʙo sumo mucodala kunand va agar ʙa onho farmonʙardori kuned, sumo va onho dar sirk ʙaroʙared
